function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Use of mass spectrometric equipment and analysis","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Handling and manipulation of chemical reagents and solvents","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Isolation and use of hcov-229e in pcr","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sanger sequencing analysis","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Replication studies with sars-cov-2 positive wastewater","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of specific pcr conditions for detecting viruses","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Handling and manipulation of viral rna samples","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Verification of specificity and sensitivity of rna sequencing","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Handling and processing of contaminated wastewater samples may pose a risk of exposure to infectious viral rna.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Analysis of wastewater samples could potentially expose individuals to infectious viral material.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in testing procedures and analysis methods for detecting coronavirus genetic material in environmental samples","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of understanding about the correlation between wastewater-based analysis and acute infection cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the distribution and survival of sars-cov-2 in the aquatic environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of sars-cov-2 via feces in wastewater","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate estimation of infection spread in a population","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delayed detection of non-detected covid-19 cases","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Restrictions on levels of crowding on public transport","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Fewer office workers in the city","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased sanitation requirements","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Monitoring people for high temperatures or signs of illness","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difficulty in maintaining the supply of vital food and medicine due to panic buying and disrupted supply chains.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High concentration of people in cities limiting the ability to travel to alternative sources of supply.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of hospitals reaching capacity and frontline medical personnel facing scarcity of resources and access to necessary items.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Detailed personal location data could be misused for tracking individuals without their consent, leading to privacy violations.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased surveillance and tracking of individuals may lead to a sense of intrusion and loss of personal freedom.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for misuse of personal health data for discriminatory practices, including employment, insurance, and access to resources.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High transmission risk in densely populated cities impacting community well-being.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disruption of smart city technologies due to lockdown and reduced city activity.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Civil-liberty concerns due to increased surveillance and personal data collection.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Questionable research practices in dutch institutes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data sharing statements from covid-19 trials","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Researchers unwilling to share data leading to lack of transparency in clinical trials","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Academic focus on quantity of publications over quality and rigor of science","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of accountability for poorly designed clinical trials and wasteful research","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Promotion of open science without concrete efforts to improve research quality","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on preprints for public-health decisions without robust filtering","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Flawed or potentially fraudulent studies being used in meta-analyses to promote ivermectin as a wonder drug","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Preprints with impossible numbers and duplicate data circulating online without formal retraction","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of scrutiny and blind trust in academic research culture","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spreading of disinformation through social media and mainstream media","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pitfalls of pandemic publishing raising questions about peer-review processes, scientific integrity, and data fraud","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Amplification of flawed trial data through unreliable meta-analyses","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failures in peer review leading to publication of low-quality or misleading research","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unproven treatments being peddled by influential figures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Scandals involving faked research data eroding trust in peer review and scientific integrity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dissemination of unsubstantiated claims about the effectiveness of ivermectin in treating covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate data from the now-discredited surgisphere database influencing treatment recommendations and national policies.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rollout of mass drug-administration campaigns in response to unsubstantiated recommendations, causing diversion of drug supplies from neglected disease programs.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Preprints with questionable or fraudulent information being used to support ineffective treatments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misleading or incorrect preprints leading to the dissemination of unreliable information","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"}]}
